Index.title: Welcome to the Path of Islam
Index.content: Islam is a way of life that promotes peace, mercy, and the recognition of the Oneness of Allah. It is a complete system of beliefs and practices based on the Qur'an and the teachings of the Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him). Through the five pillars of Islam, Muslims engage in worship, reflection, and acts of service to strengthen their relationship with Allah and contribute to the betterment of society.
